item.description:
We are hosting our first annual Halloween Hike and Picnic with your Pup!

We have rented the pavillion in Colonel Ledyard Park for:
Saturday 10/16/2010 11:00AM
(We may try for a sunday rain date if it is still available - we will email out by Thursday if the weather looks bad)

This pavillion is large, includes bathrooms (not porta potties!), grill, electricity and is connected to a hiking trail that we will go Geocaching on. The trail is only about a mile loop so we will do a couple of loops to wear out the pups.
There are also tennis courts, basketball, a play ground and other features.

Everyone who is attending please RSVP by 10/14/10 11:00am with an accurate count and include what dish you will bring in the comments.
We will provide the burgers and dogs and all the utensils to cook with, if everyone could bring a dish (Whatever their specialty is for picnics works for me!) Also this event is BYOB.

Dogs and people feel free to wear costumes as we will have a prize for the craziest dog/ owner combo!

Information:
http://www.ledyardrec...

Directions:
Drive all the way past all of the park stuff and the pavillion is on the right.

http://www.gnlicc.org...

http://www.bing.com/m...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the pavillion
item.name: First Annual Halloween Hike and Picnic with your Pup!
